title: Student Jobs: Libraries - Northwestern University
content:
Northwestern University Libraries is hiring for the academic year! Our positions are available to current and incoming Northwestern students. Thank you for your interest in working at the Libraries. Please note: Upon accepting a role at the Libraries, you will receive a “Welcome” email with next steps to complete the hiring process. See the flowchart below for more details: See a flowchart visualizing the steps to completing hiring paperwork: Apply Now Work-study: 
		Yes 
		No 
		Either Evening/weekend hours available: 
		Yes 
		No 
		Either
